subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: It is early in the N.B.A. season, but the Knicks (2-4) have some of the worst defensive statistics in the league, despite making offseason moves to improve their defense.
snippet: It is early in the N.B.A. season, but the Knicks (2-4) have some of the worst defensive statistics in the league, despite making offseason moves to improve their defense.
